guid.comments: string. Must be universally unique across all mods.
name: Bleeding Heart (Scenario Extension)
name.comments: string. Name displayed in the list of Mods
description: The Paladin is gravely wounded and gains 1 wound every turn. There is no way to stop the bleeding.
description.comments: string. Description displayed in the list of Mods
author: Yohan
author.comments: string. Author(s) displayed in the list of Mods
version.comments: string. Should be changed each time a new version of the mod is published. This will help with compatibility checks.
rewardsMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain Rewards modding data. One folder per rewards data
oathMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain Oath modding data. One folder per oath
characterMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain Character modding data. One folder per character data
enemyMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain enemy modding data. One folder per enemy.
terrainMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain Terrain modding data. One folder per terrain data
mapSectionMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain map section modding data. One folder per map section.
scenarioMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain scenario modding data. One folder per scenario mod.
scenarioExtensionMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain scenario extensions modding data. One folder per scenario extension mod.
languageMods.comments: (Optional) List<string>. List of folder names that contain language modding data. One folder per language mod.
